title: Linux uname Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the versatile uname command in Linux, which provides detailed information about your system's hardware and software configurations. Learn how to retrieve system details and combine options for comprehensive output.

meta.title: Linux uname Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the versatile uname command in Linux, which provides detailed information about your system's hardware and software configurations. Learn how to retrieve system details and combine options for comprehensive output.
meta.keywords: Linux, uname, system information, hardware, software, command line, system monitoring, system management

verify.name: Verify uname command output
verify.hint: The uname command should return 'Linux' as the kernel name. Please check your output and try again.

verify.name: Verify uname command output
verify.hint: The uname -s command should return 'Linux' as the kernel name. Please check your output and try again.

verify.name: Verify /etc/os-release output
verify.hint: The /etc/os-release file should contain the 'Ubuntu' string. Please check the output and try again.

steps.title: Combine uname Options for Detailed Output

verify.name: Verify uname -a output
verify.hint: The uname -a command should return output containing 'Linux' and 'x86_64'. Please check your output and try again.

verify.name: Verify lsb_release -a output
verify.hint: The lsb_release -a command should return output containing 'Ubuntu'. Please check your output and try again.
